name: JBoss Data Grid Camel Component Demo
summary: This is a demo that shows how the infinispan/data-grid Camel component works. Now updated to use remote listeners!
author: Thomas Qvarnstrom & Christina Lin
targetProduct: JBoss Data Grid and JBoss Fuse
productVersion: JBoss Data Grid 6.5.0 and JBoss Fuse 6.2
